Resolve Your Tax Issues

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#1C50A4″ divider_weight=”6px” _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”16%” custom_margin=”||15px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Big Text” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|500|||||||” text_text_color=”#040011″ text_line_height=”1.5em” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Free Tax Consultation service is designed to help you take the first step toward resolving your tax issues with confidence. Our experienced team of tax associates will work with you one-on-one to understand your unique financial situation and tax challenges. Whether you’re dealing with IRS notices, unpaid taxes, or liens, our goal is to provide you with a clear plan for moving forward so you can make informed decisions and regain financial peace of mind. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-cKGLPxMUQ&t=10s” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Section: YouGov Trust Point” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54″ background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_blend=”overlay” custom_padding=”15px||10px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ admin_label=”Section: Accreditation 1″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/ICO-yougov-white.svg” alt=”Icon of a trophy cup” image_icon_width=”56px” image_icon_width_tablet=”66px” image_icon_width_phone=”50px” image_icon_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” animation_style=”fade” animation=”off” border_radii_image=”on|14px|14px|14px|14px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” image_max_width=”68px” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415%22:%91%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22%93}”]

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/flag2.svg” alt=”Icon of an award” image_icon_width=”56px” image_icon_width_tablet=”66px” image_icon_width_phone=”50px” image_icon_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415″ body_font_size=”14px” body_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” animation_style=”fade” animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii_image=”on|14px|14px|14px|14px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” image_max_width=”68px” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415%22:%91%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22,%22body_text_color%22%93}” title_text=”flag2″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Licensed In All 50 States
for IRS Power Of Attorney

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||on||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415″ text_font_size=”11px” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”13px|||||” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-5a100212-1cec-4a0c-a7e8-f296dae24415%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

† According to a 2023 YouGov online survey commissioned by Affordable Tax Relief of 1,276 U.S. adults.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://optimataxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/tax-consultation-bg.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Get Your Free Consultation” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_font=”Montserrat||||||||” title_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Call today to schedule your free consultation with one of our expert tax associates. This no-obligation call is your opportunity to discuss your tax concerns and start on your path to financial peace of mind.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Get Started Now” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”CTA-Button” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”15px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7cda24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_padding=”10px|25px|10px|25px|true|true” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_vertical=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”What Does a Tax Consultation Cover?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Financial Review

We analyze your income, tax returns, and financial records to understand your complete tax situation.

Tax Issue Assessment

Our experts pinpoint the specific tax problems you’re facing, whether it’s unfiled returns, tax debts, audit notices, or wage garnishments.

Potential Relief Options

Based on our thorough review, we present tailored relief options, including:

  • Setting Up Installment Agreements
  • Negotiating Offers in Compromise
  • Requesting Currently Not Collectible Status
  • Applying for Penalty Abatement
  • Removing Tax Liens & Levies
  • Preventing Seizure of Assets
  • Halting Wage Garnishment
  • Filing Missing or Unfiled Returns
  • Protection Against Criminal Action
  • Audit and Revenue Officer Representation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”Why Choose Affordable Tax Relief for Your Tax Needs?” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Expertise

We specialize exclusively in resolving tax problems. Just as IRS agents are skilled at pursuing taxpayers, our team is expert at navigating complex tax challenges on your behalf.

Inside Knowledge

Our team works with the IRS and state taxation authorities daily, giving us unparalleled insight into their strategies and processes. This inside knowledge is our most powerful tool, enabling us to anticipate and effectively counter the IRS’s approaches in any tax situation.

Experienced Tax Consultants

Our licensed tax professionals bring over 50 years of combined industry experience to your case. Affordable Tax Relief carefully selects and employs only the most qualified tax consultants to handle every aspect of your tax resolution process.

Breathe Easy

We strategically represent your interests and alleviate the stress of IRS interactions. Our experts know how to communicate with tax authorities—what to say, when to speak, and when to strategically remain silent—ensuring you can face your tax challenges with confidence.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Trustpilot

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
